name: Duality Jump
description:
Game Made by: Oscar Vergara, Ivan Alvarez y Quim Tolosa  for the Jandu Jam

The objective of the game is score the max puntuation on each level we have (at the moment only 1)  

Use 3 simple mechanics: Jump, destroy ice Blocks and pass over WaterHoles

The Fire Ball will destroy the Ice Blocks and die in the Water Holes,

The Water Ball will pass over Water Holes and die in Ice Blocks

We have an aditional mechanic that we call Fusion. This mechanic allow us to change the balls positions
